data.eml:eml: Morphologic study of male genitalia and female description of Schistopeltis lizeri Rehn (Blaberidae, Zetoborinae, Triboniini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Valverde, Alejandra Del Carmen, Crespo, Francisco Antonio, Iglesias, Mónica Sandra (2012): Morphologic study of male genitalia and female description of Schistopeltis lizeri Rehn (Blaberidae, Zetoborinae, Triboniini). Zootaxa 3326: 62-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210491
